sentences.english: Stress management gives you a range of tools to reset your alarm system.
sentences.chinese: 控制好壓力能使你擁有一系列重置報警系統的工具。

sentences.english: Glyph of Preparation: This glyph resetting the cooldown on dismantle is questionable at best.
sentences.chinese: 預備雕文能重置拆卸是有很大問題的。

sentences.english: Keyframes reset the probability values to the defaults.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵幀會將概率值重置爲默認值。

sentences.english: Learn " to " re-check engine light from the mechanic.
sentences.chinese: 學習重置檢查引擎輕程序從一個機械師。

sentences.english: Sunblade Imps will now reset properly.
We hope to have it not reset your swing timer sometime soon.
sentences.chinese: 希望很快可以讓它不會重置普通攻擊。

sentences.english: A player may not untap more than one land during the untap phase of each of his or her turns.
sentences.chinese: 所有玩家在重置階段中最多隻可重置一張地。

sentences.english: A player may not untap more than one land during the untap phase of each of his or her turns.
sentences.chinese: 所有玩家在重置階段中最多隻可重置一張地。

sentences.english: These are good commands for resetting a printer, too.
sentences.chinese: 這些也是用於重置打印機的不錯命令。

sentences.english: In the estimation of compensation, the cost for restoring and reconstructing original assets should be take as the basis of valuation.
sentences.chinese: 受淹工礦企業補償評估應以復原重置成本爲估價標準。

sentences.english: Mana Vault does not untap during your untap phase.
sentences.chinese: 魔法力庫不可在你的重置階段中重置。

sentences.english: You can do this again if necessary to automatically reconfigure the switch.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要自動重置交換機，也可以再次這麼做。

sentences.english: You may choose not to untap Callous Oppressor during youruntap step.
sentences.chinese: 你可選擇於重置步驟中不重置無情壓制者。

sentences.english: Preparation (Subtlety) no longer refreshes the cooldown of Premeditation .
sentences.chinese: 預備現在不再重置預謀。

definition: to make a copy/to reproduce/to remake (a movie)
to revise the current edition/revised edition
to file/to save a file (computer)/saved data (for a video game etc)
